abate.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to become less strong or decrease
abate.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: We waited for the storm to abate.
abate.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to become less strong or damaging, or to make something do this
abate.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The level of wage settlements has shown no signs of abating in recent months.
